articles.description: "Singing is my beautiful, delicious obsession," the legend says
articles.content: Diana Ross’ music has taken in many stages: the Supremes, early solo hits, Lady Sings the Blues. But her late-Seventies dance hits remain some of her most beloved work. And apparently, Ross herself s… [+1593 chars]
